professionalSummary: Information Systems and Systems Analyst with a Master's degree in Computer Science and proven experience supporting academic IT environments, data-driven operations, and enterprise-style reporting workflows.

Strong background in analyzing existing systems, improving data processes, supporting system implementations, and maintaining operational reliability across Windows and Linux platforms. Known for structured documentation, data accuracy, and supporting high-volume institutional systems aligned with organizational standards.
additionalExperience: Hands-on systems and networking experimentation through a personal home lab using enterprise switching equipment like the Cisco Catalyst 3850 WS-C3850-48U-S, Routing, VLAN configuration, IP addressing, DNS & DHCP, and isolated test environments.
